title: Lingxi Zhang
text: Lingxi Zhang is a fourth-year student at the University of California, Los Angeles, double majoring in Sociology and Statistics and Data Science

title: Lingxi Zhang
text:
Research interest
Work and Labor Market, Poverty, Social Inequality and Stratification, Immigration, Health Outcomes

title: Research Project
text: This is an one-year independent research that examines the differential impacts of various working conditions on the mental and physical health of low-wage workers in two types of occupations–food delivery and retail–in China. Click here to see more details

title: Research Project

title: Research Project
text:
Research Project 3
On-going project that analyzes the relationship between the distance of children with parents and the work-related mental and physical health of children using the National Longitudinal Dataset.
